channel.title: Privacy Policy on Hambungle
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy Policy on Hambungle

item.title: Privacy Policy — CatchLedger
item.description:
Effective Date: 01/15/25
Last updated: 03/31/25

Information We Collect

CatchLedger is designed to help users track catches and trip stats. We collect only the data needed to provide that functionality.

  • Account or Identifier Information (Optional):
    If you choose to create or sign in to an account, we store the identifier needed to keep your entries synced.

  • Catch and Trip Entries (User Provided):
    Information you enter (such as fish species, dates, notes, and measurements) is stored so it can be displayed back to you.

item.title: Privacy Policy — Spiral Word Puzzle
item.description:
Effective Date: 01/15/25
Last updated: 03/31/25

Information We Collect

Spiral Word Puzzle collects a limited amount of user information solely for leaderboard functionality.

  • Authentication Information (Required):
    When submitting a high score, we collect a username or unique identifier to associate scores with players.

  • Country Location (Optional):
    You may optionally choose your country from a list when submitting a high score. This is not automatically collected and is only stored if selected by you.
